Articles.Content:
I've just gone through every thread I've ever posted. It was a weird experience.

Here's some snippets of info I got:

In January I was already waiting for Science Lab IVAs

I got no replies to this idea which I thought was a great idea :/

I made quite a successful thread speculating on what KSP would be like were it published by EA.

Have you ever gone through your old threads and found weird/interesting stuff?

Edited June 18, 2014 by Javster
